Dead by Daylight est un r√©el plaisir √† jouer entre amis le soir pour se d√©tendre apr√®s une belle journ√©e de travail. Malgr√© quelques petits bugs minimes et un jeu pas forc√©ment parfaitement optimis√©, le reste est largement satisfaisant.
Damn you nurse w green mori

Let me start by saying: this game is not perfect. There are glitches and bugs that will occasionally arise in gameplay, but the developers also are constantly doing maintenance towards them as well. Also to note, I own this game both on PS4 and PC, so a lot of my hours are not clocked by time of this review.

That being said, this is definitely my favorite horror game I've ever played. The asymmetrical gameplay is something I feel a lot of people have tried and failed so many times already (Friday the 13th and Evolve being good examples of such), but DBD does it right. Both sides are pretty fairly balanced in terms of strength and ability, where even though survivors can't directly fight back against the killer they still are given all the tools they need to protect themselves adequately.

Dead by Daylight is a lot of fun. The characters are well designed, the maps are fun to traverse and the randomized locations of the generators makes every game feel a little different. The killers have extremely varied gameplay, and the unpredictability of your killer's and teammates' abilities makes it hard to get bored playing as the survivor.

I've noticed some visual bugs when getting hooked, and the waiting time to play as the killer is absolutely ridiculous, but DbD is probably my favorite game I've bought this year.

So this inanimate object comes into my killer lobby. I looked at their profile and everybody elses and this person claims to have only "10 hours" in DBD so I say perfect. I equip omegablink on my Nurse, ruin, sloppy butcher, knock out, deerstalker, and bring a mori because i like to have fun as killer. The game beigns and this person destroys my ruin. So because this donut of a person destroyed my ruin I decided to tunnel them all game. Bad mistake, it started off with the 360 exploit. Everytime I swung, I missed. THEN this person used "jungle jims" or should I say infinites because the Nurse cannot catch people there at all. So I decided to just bloodlust this dumbass so they stood no chance. However bloodlust 5 was not enough for me to catch this person. But I decided to keep chasing him until my NOED kicked in. I finally got the sucker and facecamped him but his friends unooked him with borrowed time abuse!!

If you're tired of multiplayer games where your teams always suck ass and your opponents always BM you - play Killer. Your opponents are still assholes but if you're good you can kill them. It's very satisfying.
Nada como matar os seus amigos <3

Madden already exists. 
When this game first came out it was a great, legit horror movie sim. 
Last year or two its become all about football style plays and the style has just shifted. Lost all the enjoyment from that. Still, I got over 200 hours in, so I got my money's worth. I enjoyed the game back when it was still what it was released and advertised as.
Just really wish the devs hadn't continued developing it along the youtuber/twitch crowd's view count.

This game is infuriatingly difficult to learn, extremely scary at first, and amazingly funny with a group of players who enjoy messing about. There is simply no other game like it on the market as of now that can replicate it's gameplay and mechanics to a degree in which Dead by Daylight has accomplished. The game is worth every penny spent and every hour played in my eyes.

BEWARE! There is a steep learning curve, however, and this may affect your purchasing decision.
